== Fido Bluetooth dial-up networking ==
This information complements the more generic BluetoothDialup guide.

The <code>etc/ppp/peers/celtel</code> file looks like this:
<pre>
    
    /dev/rfcomm0 115200
    connect '/usr/sbin/chat -v -f /etc/ppp/chat-gprs'
    crtscts
    modem -detach
    noccp
    defaultroute
    usepeerdns
    noauth
    ipcp-accept-remote
    ipcp-accept-local
</pre>

The corresponding <code>/etc/ppp/chat-gprs</code> file is as below:
<pre>
"" ATZ OK
AT+CGDCONT=1,"IP","ke.celtel.com"
 OK "ATD*99***1#"
 CONNECT
</pre>
